resources.string: Greetings!\nAnd welcome to Stevenson Tour Guide!
My name is Eldon Stevenson Jr. and I\'ll be your tour guide today!
I realize my building can be very difficult to navigate, but don\'t fret!\nI\'m here to help!
How can I help you today?
Tour Guide Mode allows you to take a tour of all of Stevenson\'s buildings.
You\'re outside the lecture halls? Great! Let\'s get started!\nProceed through the doors ahead.
You have now entered Building 4 (the Lecture Halls).
